covid-message: COVID-19 is primarily airborne. Aerosols that float and slowly fill an indoor area are the way you are most likely to catch it.  Masks are your best personal defense here. In 2022, You need BETTER MASKS than simple cloth masks.
table-info: This table is about improvement in relative protection as you opt for better mask combinations
rows-info: Rows - masks the infectious person is wearing
column-info: Columns - masks the person who could be infected is wearing
n95-footer: N95, FFP2, KN95, and KF94 respirator standards differ on minimum filtration effectiveness. That said, our table shows them all the same. You should also check your sources carefully as all of these have been counterfeited in the pandemic.
